name: The Big Fucking Pizza
contains: Whole-wheat (pizza) base with ground tomatoes, mozzarella, basil

name: Tenerezza pizza
contains: Whole-wheat (pizza) base, spinach, cynara, pickled pepper. Decorated with orange and arugula. Served with Balsamic cream

name: Milano
contains: Ground tomatoes, marinated spicy eggplant by homemade Italian recipe, salami Pepperoni, mozzarella and Parmesan cheese

name: Pizza Vegana
contains: Ground tomatoes, mozzarella, salami picante (spicy), hot pepper

name: Margherita
contains: A wholewheat pizza topped with mozzarella, chicken, honey marinated pear, Gorgonzola, and Parmesan cheese

name: Pepperoni
contains: A wholewheat pizza topped with mozzarella, beef, pickled cucumbers, red onion, and the Barbecue sauce. Garnished with strips of bacon

name: Diavola
contains: Whole wheat pizza topped with ground tomatoes, mozzarella, ricotta, prosciutto cotto, oregano, basil, and almond flakes
